parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds magazines with specified ammo count to the cargo space of a vehicle or a container.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> cargospace [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]] [magazine, quantity, ammocount] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> cargospace: [[Object]] - vehicle or container or weaponholder </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [magazine, quantity, ammocount]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazine: [[String]] - magazine class name </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> quantity: [[Number]] - number of magazines to add </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> ammocount: [[Number]] - ammo count in each magazine</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ammobox [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]] ["30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag", 2, 5];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[magazinesAmmoCargo]], [[addMagazineCargo]], [[addMagazineGlobal]], [[addMagazine]], [[addMagazines]], [[addMagazinePool]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[clearMagazineCargo]], [[addWeaponCargo]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[addItemCargo]], [[addItemCargoGlobal]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
